question.text:
Which of the following statements support the view that an elaborate sexual reproductive process appeared much later in the organic evolution.

i. Lower groups of organisms have simpler body design.
ii. Asexual reproduction is common in lower groups.
iii. Asexual reproduction is common in higher groups of organisms.
iv. The high incidence of sexual reproduction is observed in angiosperms and vertebrates.

Choose the correct answer from the options.

solution.text:
Elaborate sexual reproductive process appeared much later in the organic evolution because:
• Lower groups of organisms have simpler body design.
• Asexual reproduction is common in lower groups of organisms.
• High incidence of sexual reproduction is observed in angiosperms and vertebrates.
